channel.title: All the President's Men on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in All the President's Men on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Robert Redford Hoped to Make a Sequel to ‘The Candidate,’ Decades After the Original Film
item.description: Collaborator Rod Lurie, who directed the late screen legend in ‘The Last Castle,’ tells The Hollywood Reporter about the pair’s efforts to make a follow-up to the 1972 political satire.

item.title: Robert Redford Hoped to Make a Sequel to ‘The Candidate,’ Decades After the Original Film
item.description: Collaborator Rod Lurie, who directed the late screen legend in ‘The Last Castle,’ tells The Hollywood Reporter about the pair’s efforts to make a follow-up to the 1972 political satire.

item.title: Robert Redford, Golden Boy of Hollywood, Dies at 89
item.description: The Oscar winner and Sundance founder died Sept. 16 at his home in Utah.
